subject: Philosophy
title: Becoming Authentic
description: A fast breakdown of Becoming Authentic for builders.

hook.text: Authenticity sounds simple: be yourself. But existentialists say it's the hardest thing you'll ever do.

buildup.text: It requires confronting your freedom, accepting responsibility, and dropping the masks you wear.

discovery.text: Heidegger said authenticity comes when you face your own mortality. Death makes your life uniquely yours.

twist.text: You can't be authentic once and stop. It's a constant struggle against conformity and self-deception.

climax.text: Authenticity isn't a destination. It's a way of engaging with every choice, every day.

punchline.text: Be yourself. It's harder than it sounds.

quiz.question: What did Heidegger say triggers authentic existence?
